name: Vulnerable JavaScript Libraries
description: Detects JavaScript libraries with known security vulnerabilities. Similar to Retire.js, identifies outdated jQuery, Angular, React, Vue, Bootstrap, Lodash and 50+ other libraries with CVEs.
author: Dominator Team
remediation: Update all JavaScript libraries to their latest secure versions. Implement a dependency management system. Use tools like npm audit, Snyk, or Dependabot for automated vulnerability scanning. Remove unused libraries. Consider using CDN integrity checks (SRI).
